package.name: linux_headers
package.unpack: major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/linux-${major}.${minor}.tar.xz | tar xf -
package.patch: major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` cd linux-${major}.${minor} if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz ] ; then unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz | patch -p1 fi cd .. mv -v linux-${major}.${minor} linux-${PKGVERSION}
package.install: mkdir -p /tools/include cd linux-${PKGVERSION} make INSTALL_HDR_PATH=dest headers_install cp -rv dest/include/* /tools/include
